```{r setup, eval=TRUE, echo = FALSE}
library(weathergenr)
```

```{r load-data}
#daily.obs
#daily.sim
```

```{r prepare-files}
names(ncdata)
```

```{r run-evaluate}
evaluateWegen(daily.sim = rlz_sample,
              daily.obs = obs_sample,
              output.path = paste0(plots_path,"plots"),
              variables = c("precip", "temp", "temp_min", "temp_max"),
              variable.labels = c("Precipitation", "Avg. Temperature", "Min. Temperature", "Max. Temperature"),
              variable.units = NULL,
              realization.num = realization.num,
              wet.quantile = 0.3,
              extreme.quantile = 0.8,
              show.title = TRUE)
```
